title: Bottle And Stopper, 1986-61-238-a,b, ca. 1810
provenance: Christies, London (July 11, 1978, sale 1071, Lot 51); WPW, NY.
description: Oviform body on splayed foot, with flared lip and pouring spout; cut diamond-band center, flat vertical facets above, twisted flutes below, scalloped lip rim; cut spiral fluting top of stopper.
